Title: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish a mandatory bicycle with electric assist and electric scooter training course and an optional bicycle training course
Summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish a mandatory bicycle with electric assist and electric scooter training course; directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish an optional bicycle training course.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing training courses for operators of bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters and for operators of bicycles
